body:
All Versions

  • Added the ability for clients to have custom subdomains and login text. For example, instead of navigating to http://beta.network360.com, users would go to https://mycompany.network360.com. The company's logo and custom text would then appear on the login page.
  • Fixed bug on all pages with a location textbox that caused the page to appear to freeze when the user typed in an asterisk in that textbox.
  • Now preventing users with IE6 and IE7 browsers from logging on to version 2 since those browsers are not currently supported.
